about_the_game:
Frantic game with very simple gameplay using a movement and combat system that uses only the keyboard.
Survive with your character and kill as many zombies as you can while collecting equipment to improve in the next fight.
The more zombies you kill, the higher your level and the more rewards you can choose from!
Each playthrough will be totally different from the previous one, you will be stronger, you will get different rewards and you will be much more prepared than before.

  • Infinity Gameplay
  • Cool Music
  • Satisfactory Gameplay
  • Funny and Simple

name: Zombies Under Control

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
